cmp: 呈 (to assume (a form)/to submit/to petition/to show/to present/to offer)
mng: to show off, to flaunt, to carry out or succeed in a scheme, to indulge, to give free rein to

exm.mng: to prevail, to have one's way, to get away with it
to show off one's ability, to boast one's merits
to boast of one's quarrels to others (idiom)
to give way to one's beastly lust
to show off, to try to be brave
